## Coming soon

This guide will show you how to integrate Xorq with your existing data and ML infrastructure.

You will learn integration patterns for common tools in the modern data stack.

**What you'll accomplish:**
- Integrate with Airflow/Dagster
- Connect to existing data warehouses
- Export to BI tools
- Bridge with existing ML platforms

**Prerequisites:**
- Existing tool stack to integrate with
- Understanding of tool APIs

Check back soon for the complete guide.
